txt.en: 'The battle goes on, recruit. We need every body in the field to be upright and capable. If you think you are ready to take the fight to the enemy, then speak with the War-tyrant. He's got a list that'll keep you busy.'

'A new recruit, eh? Good. Take this. It's a list of tasks that need doing. Make yourself useful and I will see you rewarded and marvel as you rise through the ranks of my war-host. Or, be like so many other, maggots. Useless. Pathetic. Unworthy.'
The War-tyrant has a set of tasks for you and offers rewards if you can complete them.
Speak with War-tyrant Akúlhun about available tasks.
